publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5736 John Swinney: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2009 Amendment Order 2010—That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2009 Amendment Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*

S3M-5736 John Swinney: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2009 Amendment Order 2010—That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2009 Amendment Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: Bruce Crawford
